articles.title: FAA investigating Bahamas-bound flight delayed by teen mask rebellion - Fox Business
articles.description: The FAA is investigating the Bahamas-bound American Airlines flight delayed on Monday by rowdy teens who refused wear masks — as the Boston-area group’s program provider claimed most of the kids did nothing wrong.

articles.title: The Lambda COVID-19 variant is in Canada. How worried should we be? - Global News
articles.description: The Lambda COVID-19 variant is spreading in South America and has been detected in Canada. Here's what we know about how dangerous it is, and how well vaccines work against it.
articles.content:
Another COVID-19 variant, called Lambda, has been identified in Canada responsible for 11 cases in the country so far, according to Health Canada.

articles.title: These parts of the US could become 'breeding grounds' for potentially more Covid-19 variants, expert says - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Out of the Covid-19 pandemic, two Americans are emerging: One protected by vaccines and the other still vulnerable to infection -- and experts say progress made across the entire US is being threatened by low-vaccinated regions.
